context: DocuSign, Inc. is a electronic signature and agreement cloud company focused on e-signature, contract lifecycle management, and agreement automation. AI-powered contract analysis. Competing with Adobe Sign, Dropbox.

competitors.name: Adobe Sign
competitors.notes: Part of Adobe Document Cloud, strong integration with Adobe ecosystem

competitors.name: Dropbox Sign (HelloSign)
competitors.notes: E-signature solution integrated with Dropbox, acquired in 2019

competitors.name: PandaDoc
competitors.notes: Document automation platform with proposals, quotes, and e-signatures

competitors.name: SignNow
competitors.notes: E-signature platform owned by airSlate with focus on ease of use

competitors.name: Docusign CLM competitors
competitors.notes: Contract lifecycle management competitors like Icertis, Agiloft

competitors.name: Zoho Sign
competitors.notes: E-signature solution part of Zoho's business software suite

competitors.name: OneSpan Sign
competitors.notes: Enterprise e-signature with focus on security and compliance

competitors.name: Conga
competitors.notes: Revenue lifecycle management including contract management and e-signature
